contents:
"The virus is controllable, and preventable, just like democracy in China"


You know it's funny I was just playing a game of Plague inc and I made a virus that started in China...
Don't worry Madagascar survived and I lost.


Day1: don't worry everything is fine

Day7:virus is spreading

Day30:corpses everyw
here Elon musk is in mars


" our trusted source, Chinese state run media" lol


This virus HAS NO CURE and NO ONE KNOWS HOW IT IS SPREAD! See the CDC.


The Corona virus is one of the best exports from the CCP since ancient times.


My favorite is when they organized a massive community dinner a few miles from the epicenter to show that there was nothing to worry about.
